item.title: Microsoft Word, SharePoint, a Form and NO InfoPath on Server
item.description: So, just recently I was asked to work yet another miracle. The Scope. We need to go paperless. We need to move a certain form to an online platform and make it easy for users to fill in. With a custom picture and add checkboxes on top of that. We need this information to be saved onto a SharePoint site with unique filenames.
